meanings.sent1: The children were raring to go on their field trip.
meanings.sent2: She was always raring to help others in need.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was raring to play fetch with its owner.
meanings.sent4: The team was raring to win the championship, fueled by their determination.
meanings.sent5: His raring spirit inspired those around him to strive for greatness.

meanings.sent1: After hours of practice, the team was raring for the big game.
